name: Sea Of Fatness: Save Humanity Together
description: Sea of Fatness: 'Save Humanity Together' is a dystopian game about a future reigned by fat and Mr. TrumPET. Only you, and the power of burgers and apples can save the world from this man. Sink Mr. TrumPET's holy ark before he grabs the money and escapes to Cuba.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista upwards Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: You need humor to play this
